select * from bu_store_with_manager where 1=1 <#if query??> <#-- -------------------关键字查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and (
id like '%${key}%' or
store_id like '%${key}%' or
store_name like '%${key}%' or
manager_id like '%${key}%' or
manager_name like '%${key}%' or
tenant_code like '%${key}%'
) </#if> <#-- -------------------关键字查询结束 --------------- -->
<#-- -------------------综合查询开始 --------------- -->
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if> <#if query.id??> and id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.id)}' </#if>
<#if query.storeCode??> and store_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.storeCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.storeName??> and store_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.storeName)}' </#if>
<#if query.managerCode??> and manager_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.managerCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.managerName??> and manager_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.managerName)}' </#if>
<#if query.createDateBegin?? && query.createDateEnd??> and date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createDateBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createDateEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateDateBegin?? && query.updateDateEnd??> and date_format(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateDateBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateDateEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.tenantCode??> and tenant_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tenantCode)}' </#if>
<#-- -------------------综合查询结束 --------------- --> </#if>
